title: Panel, late 18th or early 19th century
medium: Oil on canvas, papier mache, gilded wood (frame)
description: Square panel with chinoiserie scene of woman in sedan chair carried by attendants; man bowing down to her, partially robed woman lounging nearby; in background, two Chinamen standing or seated on fanciful platform with stairway.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, late 18th or early 19th century.
late 18th or early 19th century. Oil on canvas, papier mache, gilded wood (frame). Gift of Neil Sellin. 1975-59-1.
